derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, based on Latin neptis 'granddaughter', feminine of nepos 'nephew, grandson' (see nephew), from an Indo-European root shared by Dutch nicht, German Nichte

entry.def: Someone's niece is the daughter of their sister or brother.

example.ex: ...his niece from America, the daughter of his eldest sister.
example.tran: 他从美国来的外甥女，他大姐的女儿

means.word_mean: 1. a daughter of your brother or sister
